title: D-Link DAP-2622 DDP Get SSID List WPA PSK Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of D-Link DAP-2622 routers. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the DDP service. The issue results from the lack of authentication prior to allowing access to functionality. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to disclose stored credentials, leading to further compromise.
addtionnal_details: D-Link has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://supportannouncement.us.dlink.com/announcement/publication.aspx?name=SAP10349
timeline:
2023-01-20 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-08-25 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Dmitry "InfoSecDJ" Janushkevich of Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative
